author: NewsBreak Original
title: Here‚Äôs how to see Leanne Morgan live on tour in 2024
text:
One of comedy‚Äôs biggest up-and-coming stars is 58-years-old. Leanne Morgan , a mother of three and grandmother to two, released her first Netflix special last year and is now embarking on the second leg of her nationwide ‚ÄòJust Getting Started Tour.‚Äô Along the way, she‚Äôll perform back-to-back headlining spots at Buffalo, NY‚Äôs UB Center For The Arts on Saturday, March 16 and then a week later, she‚Äôll drop into Red Bank, NJ‚Äôs Hackensack Meridian Health Theatre for a pair of shows on Saturday, March 23. ‚ÄúI‚Äôll be sharing more stories of my real life, my family and my experiences and I hope people will still come away from this new hour saying, ‚Äòthis is my life- is Leanne spying on me?,‚Äô‚Äù said Morgan in a statement. If that sounds like the show for you, it isn‚Äôt too late to grab tickets to see Morgan at one of her 48 gigs from January through June. You won‚Äôt have to spend that much either. At the time of publication, the lowest price we found on tickets was $40 before fees on Vivid Seats. Most other shows had seats starting anywhere from $45 to $70 before fees although there were a few outliers where tickets prices began over $100. Looking for a few more details before smashing that buy button ? We‚Äôre here to help, Leanne fans. Our team has everything you need to know and more about the ‚ÄòJust Getting Started Tour‚Äô below. All prices listed above are subject to fluctuation. As noted above, Morgan has a whopping 48 shows lined up this year. That includes stops in major markets like Las Vegas (Feb. 2), Cleveland (March 15), Greensboro (April 4-5), Baltimore (May 18) and Detroit (June 22). Also, she‚Äôs slated to headline at the second-ever Netflix is a Joke Festival in Los Angeles on May 4. Wondering if she‚Äôs headed to a city near you? You can find a complete calendar including all ‚ÄòJust Getting Started Tour‚Äô dates, venues and links to the cheapest tickets available here . From May 1-12, 2024, the Netflix is a Joke Festival is returning to Los Angeles for over 300 (!) shows spread out across 35 venues. And yes, many of your favorite comedians will be there along with Morgan. Just a few of the mega names on this year‚Äôs lineup include Chris Rock , Bill Burr , David Letterman , Trevor Noah and controversial crowd work wunderkind Matt Rife . They‚Äôll be joined by household names John Mulaney , Jon Stewart , Ali Wong , Seth Rogen and Sarah Silverman . Best of all, seven-time Super Bowl winner Tom Brady will be on hand for ‚ÄòThe Greatest Roast of All Time,‚Äô where Jeff Ross and celebrities will poke fun fun at the former NFLer. As of now, over 100 acts have been announced for the sprawling, mega event , the first since 2022. You can get tickets for the show of your choosing here . Based on our findings, Morgan has two hours under her belt. Here‚Äôs how you can see them ASAP before catching her live this year. ‚ÄúSo Yummy‚Äù (2017) is streaming on Amazon
‚ÄúI‚Äôm Every Woman‚Äù (2023) is streaming on Netflix While not every comic will have you asking ‚Äúare they spying on me?!‚Äù there are quite a few relatable performers on the road this year. Here are just five of our favorites you won‚Äôt want to miss live these next few months. ‚Ä¢ Tina Fey with Amy Poehler ‚Ä¢ Chelsea Handler ‚Ä¢ Wanda Sykes ‚Ä¢ Paula Poundstone ‚Ä¢ Nikki Glaser Who else is pounding the pavement? Check out our list of the 50 biggest concert tours in 2024 here to find out.

author: Blanca Gonz√°lez
title: Receta de panettone casero: uno de los postres estrella de la Navidad y la mejor manera de terminar 2023
text:
Receta de panettone casero: uno de los postres estrella de la Navidad y la mejor manera de terminar 2023
Si est√°s buscando una manera especial de terminar el a√±o, ¬øpor qu√© no probar a cocinar tu propio panettone? Este delicioso pan dulce italiano es perfecto para celebrar las fiestas, y es una actividad divertida y gratificante que puedes compartir con amigos y familiares.
¬øC√≥mo preparar un panettone?
Preparar un panettone no es tan dif√≠cil como parece. Con un poco de planificaci√≥n y pr√°ctica, puedes crear un panettone delicioso y esponjoso que todos adorar√°n.
Con o sin chocolate, con fruta escarchada o sin ella, acompa√±ado de un humeante chocolate o un caf√©, o para 'pecar' entre horas aprovechando que estamos en Navidad, el panettone -uno de los dulces m√°s populares de Italia- ya forma parte de nuestra gastronom√≠a y, es innegabe, ¬°es un capricho para el paladar!
Y aunque es perfecto para sorprender a nuestros invitados en Nochevieja, A√±o Nuevo o Reyes como alternativa al rosc√≥n, no es un bizcocho sencillo de preparar. Por ello, de la mano de Pazo de Vilane, te contamos una sencilla versi√≥n para principantes de este delicioso postre, as√≠ la como algunos trucos para hornear el mejor panettone y que quede tierno y delicioso.
Tips para conseguir el panettone perfecto
- Escoge una buena harina de fuerza. Y es que, en el caso del panettone, una de las claves del √©xito es escoger una buena harina de fuerza. Si dudas, nuestra recomendaci√≥n es preguntar en una panader√≠a de confianza para que te aconsejen la mejor.
- El reposo de la masa, siempre en el horno. El sitio perfecto para dejar reposando la masa del panettone es el horno. Y recuerda, tapado, pero no encendido ni caliente. All√≠ la masa estar√° a salvo de corrientes o de la excesiva humedad o sequedad del ambiente.
- Horneado de 45 minutos a 180¬∫. El tiempo aproximado de horneado de este panettone son 45 minutos a 180¬∫. Aunque, dependiendo del horno, puede que a partir de la media hora ya empiece a estar dorado en la superficie. Si es as√≠, abre la puerta del horno, coloca r√°pidamente una hoja de papel de aluminio encima y contin√∫a a la misma temperatura el cuarto de hora restante.
- Boca abajo y con palillos. El truco definitivo para que el panettone quede perfecto es pinchar en su base unos palillos largos, como los de brocheta, y colgarlo boca abajo hasta que se enfr√≠e por completo. Para ello, se pueden usar dos botes de alimentos.
Receta del panettone para principiantes
Ingredientes
Para el fermento:
- 125 g de harina de fuerza
- 4 g de levadura fresca
- 125 g de leche
Para la masa:
- 260 g de harina de fuerza
- 4 g de levadura fresca
- una cucharilla de caf√© de sal
- 80 g de az√∫car blanca
- 1 cucharada de miel
- 110 g de mantequilla a punto pomada
- 1 cucharada de esencia de vainilla
- 1 huevo campero
- 1 yema
- 50 g de leche templada
- 2 cucharadas de ron
- La ralladura de una naranja (sin la parte blanca)
- La ralladura de un lim√≥n (sin la parte blanca)
- Media taza de chispas de chocolate
- Media taza de uvas pasas hidratadas en ron
Para el ganache de chocolate:
- 1 tableta de chocolate negro (70% cacao)
- 80 g mantequilla
- Tres cuartos de un vaso de leche evaporada
Preparaci√≥n
- En un robot de cocina coloca todos los ingredientes del fermento y mezcla a velocidad baja durante 20 segundos.
- Saca la masa, que habr√° quedado bastante pegajosa, y ll√©vala a un cuenco de cristal. A continuaci√≥n, c√∫brela con un pa√±o limpio de algod√≥n y deja que repose durante 3 horas en el horno, que no estar√° encendido.
- Transcurrido este tiempo, el fermento habr√° triplicado su tama√±o. Ll√©valo de nuevo al robot de cocina (limpio y bien seco) y a√±ade los ingredientes de la masa: la harina, la levadura, el az√∫car, las ralladuras de lim√≥n y naranja, la leche, el ron, la esencia de vainilla, el huevo y la yema.
- Mezcla a velocidad baja durante 25 segundos hasta formar la masa. Luego, selecciona un programa de amasado y deja que trabaje durante 15 minutos.
- Una vez transcurran los primeros 8 minutos de amasado (pero sin parar la m√°quina) a√±ade muy poco a poco la mantequilla a punto de pomada y la pizca de sal. Cuando s√≥lo quede un minuto, incorpora las uvas pasas y las chispas de chocolate.
- A continuaci√≥n, coloca la masa en un molde apto para panettone y d√©jalo levar en el horno durante 6 horas, como m√≠nimo. Ir√° subiendo poco a poco, e incluso llegar√° a sobresalir del molde. Recuerda que en ese proceso el horno estar√° apagado.
- Precalienta el horno a 180¬∫ y hornea durante 45 minutos. Vigila si se tuesta demasiado. Cuando est√© listo, apaga el horno y deja que se enfr√≠e un poco con la puerta entreabierta. Luego, s√°calo, pincha la base con palitos largos de brocheta y cu√©lgalo boca abajo como indic√°bamos m√°s arriba.
- Si te gusta con una cobertura de ganache, pon a calentar el chocolate al ba√±o Mar√≠a. Una vez est√© derretido incorpora la mantequilla y remueve, hasta que se integre.
- Finalmente, a√±ade la leche evaporada y contin√∫a removiendo hasta que est√© brillante. Vierte sobre el panettone y s√≠rvelo en una bonita fuente.

author: Cedric 'BIG CED' Thornton
title: NYC Woman In Car Fatally Shot During Shocking Ambush Captured On Surveillance Video
text:
by Cedric 'BIG CED' Thornton
December 28, 2023
NYC Woman In Car Fatally Shot During Shocking Ambush Captured On Surveillance Video
The 28-year-old mother of one was killed instantly by a bullet to the head.
A New York City woman was killed when several gunmen approached the car she was in, shooting several rounds into the driver‚Äôs side, striking her in the head and killing her instantly. It was all caught on surveillance video.
Three men
ran up on a Black Honda sedan on a Queens street, targeting the male driver, who was also shot, but the passenger in the front seat, 28-year-old Clarisa Burgos, died after being hit in the head with a bullet from one of the gunmen. The troubling incident occurred just before midnight near 127th Street and Liberty Avenue in the Richmond Hill section on Dec. 26.
The 39-year-old unnamed driver tried to escape the scene before getting shot, as a video shows two men approaching the vehicle on the driver‚Äôs side. A third man came around from the passenger side to try to finish him off after the first two men fired through the window. As the driver hit the gas to get away, the three men ran away from the car. The man drove 2.5 miles away to a police station, the 103rd Precinct station house.
üî¥BREAKING NEWS LAST Night
Shocking video shows the moment three gunmen ambushed a vehicle in Queens Tuesday night, killing a woman in the front passenger seat and wounding the driver.
Clarisa Burgos 28 was shot once in the head and died on the spot, police said.
Nyc is going‚Ä¶
[pic.twitter.com/upGyElPa8P]
‚Äî Wilsonxdi (@wilsonxdi)
[December 28, 2023]
The driver caught six bullets in the torso and was taken to Jamaica Hospital Medical Center by paramedics, where he was listed in stable condition. The young mother of a 4-year-old son, Burgos, was declared dead at the scene.
‚ÄúWe‚Äôve raised her in a good way, with love,‚Äù her aunt told The Post. ‚ÄúGod knows what has happened to her.‚Äù
The relationship between the Burgos and the driver wasn‚Äôt disclosed, and the police have stated that they have no motive for the deadly shooting. There have been no arrests made in the killing.
RELATED CONTENT:
2 Teenagers In Custody After Fatal Christmas Eve Shooting Of Sister
